actions.committee: Senate Select Committee on Indian Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Select Committee on Indian Affairs.
Reported to Senate from the Select Committee on Indian Affairs with amendment, S. Rept. 96-537.

actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to extend the authority of the Secretary of the Interior to declare and proclaim land to be Indian reservation land.

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended) Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire lands in trust for Indian tribes, including the Pueblo de Jemez and the Navajo Tribes, in Arizona and New Mexico, and to proclaim new Indian reservations on such lands or add such lands to existing reservations.

titles.title: A bill to extend the authority of the Secretary of the Interior to declare and proclaim land to be Indian reservation land.
